course.introduction:
"本课程以介绍计算机图形学领域的最新的研究成果及进展为主，为大家展示授课老师在各方向的出色的研究工作，使大家聚焦科研最前沿的工作和进展。课程同时兼顾本科生也介绍该领域的一些基本问题和研究方向，多视角、多层面地深入到各个热点方向的最新研究动态。

课程的内容涵盖计算机图形学、CAD/CAE/CAM、计算机视觉、可视化、虚拟现实与增强现实、图像处理、人机交互等内容。
course.introductionEn: This course aims to provide the state-of-the-art progress of computer graphics to students by introducing the recent works of the lecturers which let students catch the advances of this field. The course also provides some fundamental knowledge and research works for undergraduate students with various promising development trends.

course.introduction: 在课堂中，我们会重点讲述“图论”中几个经典定理的组合证明，比如Hall婚配定理。此外，我们还会深入学习组合学中的几个重要概念，比如拉丁方与区组设计。
course.introductionEn: In the course, we will pay attention to use the combinatorical manner to prove some classical theorems in the Graph Theory, such as Hall Marriage Theorem. Besides, we will also learn some important concepts, for example the Latin Square and the Design. The course is open to graduate students and advanced  undergraduate students, however some knowledge of linear algebra required.

course.introduction: 課程內容包括分子電子結構計算原理、Hrtree-Fock 自洽場方法、電子相關效應、含電子相關效應全初始計算、多組態方法：CI、MRCI、CASCF、第二量子化、多體理論方法：MP2、耦合叢集理論、CASPT2、QM/MM、DFT、勢能面與反應路徑、分子軌域之分析、大體系快速計算，與實際上應用：分子性質、光譜、及材料與生物化學相關之應用。
course.introductionEn: A short introduction to the principle of molecular electronic computations including Hartee-Fock method, electron correlation, post Hartree-Fock ab initio methods, Multi-configuration methods: CI, MRCI, CASCF, The second quantization, Many-body Theory: MP2, Coupled-Cluster theory, CASPT2, QM/MM, DFT, PES & reaction routes, analysis of MO: ELF (electron localization function), linear scaling for large systems, and applications of molecular electronic computations such as molecular properties, spectrum, and practical applications in materials and biomolecules.
course.designateTextbook: "Quantum Chemistry (Ira N. Levine)  量子化学 （Levine著）"
course.referenceTextbook: Literature related to theoretical and computational chemistry. 理論計算化學相關文獻

course.introduction: 本课程主要讲述机器人设计与制作的基础知识。重点介绍机器人的机械、电路、电源、传感器、直流电机、步进电机、舵机以及常用电子元器件的原理与应用电路。使学生初步掌握机器人的设计与制作方法，能够参加校内外的机器人竞赛。
course.introductionEn: "This course focuses on the basic knowledge of robot design and building. The principle and application circuit of the robot’s mechanical, electric circuit, power supply, sensor, DC motor, stepping motor, servo motor and common electronic components are introduced in this paper.The students can master the method of building the robot, and  participate in the robot competition ."

course.introduction: 通过本门课程的学习和实践，使学生熟练掌握并运用细胞培养的相关知识和实验技能，包括细胞流式仪、生物荧光显微镜、激光共聚焦显微镜的操作；哺乳动物细胞的原代及传代培养；哺乳动物的外源基因导入及相关功能分析等，为学生将来在科研实验室的科学研究打下基础。
course.introductionEn: Comprehensive Experiments in Cell Biology is designed for students to master the knowledge and experimental skills related to the experiments in cell culture and laying the foundation for scientific research in the future. This course including the operation of biological fluorescence microscope, laser scanning confocal microscope and flow cytometry etc; primary and passage cell culture of mammalian cells; exogenous gene transfection and function analysis of mammalian cells.

course.introduction: 生物化学与分子生物学综合实验主要内容包括葡萄糖异构酶的基因克隆、表达、鉴定、纯化及酶学性质分析, 实验所涉及到的相关实验技术基本上涵盖了当前分子生物学、生物化学的实验手段。这样的课程设计使实验项目之间前后关联，从而使学生们对一个完整的现代生物化学与分子生物学研究项目有系统的认识，激发同学对科学研究的兴趣。
course.introductionEn: The main contents of Comprehensive Experiments in Biochemistry and Molecular  Biolology  include clone, expression, identification, purification and enzymatic properties assays of glucose isomerase. It provides students with a broad and profound backgrounds in biochemical and molecular biological experiments and cultivates student’s interests in scientific research.
course.designateTextbook: 《生物化学与分子生物学实验》, 中国科大, 2012年

course.introduction:
《机器人设计与制作》是一门综合性课程，旨在培养学生在机器人设计与制作方面的理论知识和实践技能。课程内容涵盖机器人系统的基本组成、传感器与驱动器、控制系统、机械结构设计以及编程实现等方面。

本课程分为课堂授课与RoboGame机器人大赛设计制作实践两部分，通过赛教结合方式提高学生们的创新思维和动手实践能力。选课同学须在选课之前组队报名参加当年度的中科大RoboGame机器人大赛。
course.introductionEn:
《Robot Design and Production》is a comprehensive course aimed at cultivating students' theoretical knowledge and practical skills in robot design and production. The course content covers the basic components of robot systems, sensors and drivers, control systems, mechanical structure design, and programming implementation.

This course is divided into two parts: classroom teaching and RoboGame robot competition design and production practice. Through a combination of competition and teaching, students can improve their innovative thinking and hands-on practical skills. Students who choose this course must team up and register for the current year's RoboGame Robotics Competition at the University of Science and Technology of China before selecting courses.
course.referenceTextbook: 《机器人学导论》（原书第3版），（美）John J. Craig著，贠超 等译，2006年 机械工业出版社出版。

courseCategory.name: 核心通识

course.introduction: "本课程是面向全校各院系本科生开设的一门公共选修课。课程目标是帮助可能缺乏足够或系统化硬件知识的学生提高他们的编程技能，使学生在设计程序时，能充分意识到计算机程序在执行时，底层在做什么？发生了什么事？可能被执行的数据或指令流图。它能帮助学生更好地理解编程时必需清楚的底层概念与抽象，从而使学生能设计高效、可移植、健壮的程序，并能够更快地进行程序排错、改进程序性能等。本课程拟从编程应用，即程序员的视角，以更广泛和更实用的角度看待程序执行时计算机系统底层和硬件如何操作处理、存储信息和通信，解释相关的底层概念、核心机制，并给出一些简明且有效的抽象模型。课程主要内容将涉及：信息表示，处理器体系与保护模式，机器层级/汇编/高级语言代码、存储组织与管理，进程、程序的链接/加载/性能优化，Linux文件系统等。"
course.introductionEn: "This course is presented as a common optional course for all computer science and engineering students of USTC.The aim of this course is to help students who may lack enough knowledge of hardware and underlying system of computers, to improve their skills in program, especially in dealing with issues of performance, portability and robustness, and to help students become more effective programmers who know what is going on “under the hood” of a computer system, how things work and what data and code imaging is executed.  It can also help the students to have a better grasp of the fundamental concepts and abstractions from their programming, understand how these abstractions are implemented on the hardware and software of real computer systems,  which will able to help them fix the fail points quickly when their programs break, and make their programs faster and more reliable.This course will provide a programmer’s view of how computer systems execute programs, store information, and communicate in a broad and practical perspective, explain the relative underlying concepts, mechanism, and present some concise & valuable abstraction models. Topics covered include: information representing, processor architecture and protected mode, memory organization and management, machine-level /assembly code and its generation by optimizing compilers, process, program linking, loading and performance evaluation, Linux file system, etc."
course.designateTextbook: 《操作系统原理与应用》，自编教材
course.referenceTextbook: 《Solid State Physics》，Ashcroft/Mermin Randal E. Bryant, David O’Hallaron等著，弓奕利等译. 深入理解计算机系统. 北京:中国电力出版社,2004.

course.introduction:
本课程是面向全校各院系本科生开设的一门公共选修课。

        课程将从实用的角度，介绍LINUX系统管理和高级应用相关的主题，主要内容包括：LINUX综述;基本安装和配置;涵盖文件系统、内存与进程管理、网络等系统基本管理操作;Apache Web服务器、FTP服务及其他各类常用RPM包安装与更新; Shell 脚本以及LINUX环境下数据库与高级语言编程模式等。

        由于安全性、稳定性和知识产权等综合因素，大型组织或公司更青睐于选用UNIX/LINUX作为应用平台。而国内外目前可从事高级LINUX管理和应用的人才非常紧缺。本课程不仅可帮助学生弥补“LINUX应用”知识结构缺陷，为毕业后的求职加分，也有利于参加Linux系统工程师/软件工程师等相关认证考试。
course.introductionEn: "This course is presented as a common optional course for all computer science and engineering students of USTC.This course offers practical knowledge for managing Linux servers. Topics to be covered include: introduction to Linux; installation and configuration of Linux; manage file systems, users, or kernel’s access to processor time, devices, and memory etc; install and configure network services, Apache web server, FTP, MySQL and other RPM package; create shell scripts and adapt them for your own needs; build C/JAVA applications.Linux is well-known for its reliability, flexibility, low cost of ownership, and technical elegance. It is now a standard corporate platform with users numbering in the hundreds of millions, and there is a definite shortage of talented administrators. This course will be helpful to students who want to rationalize their knowledge structure and prepare the LINUX certification exams. programs faster and more reliable.This course will provide a programmer’s view of how computer systems execute programs, store information, and communicate in a broad and practical perspective, explain the relative underlying concepts, mechanism, and present some concise & valuable abstraction models. Topics covered include: information representing, processor architecture and protected mode, memory organization and management, machine-level /assembly code and its generation by optimizing compilers, process, program linking, loading and performance evaluation, Linux file system, etc."
course.referenceTextbook: Tom Adelstein. Linux System Administration. O'Reilly Media, 2007.

course.introductionEn: This is a practical course in computer science on solving application problems using computer programming, which deepens students’ understanding of problem solving and programming and improves students’ ability to write some large programs to solve several application problems, based on several classical topics of practical training.

course.introduction: "机器人是一个交叉学科，并对创新人才培养具有积极作用。本课程以二年级本科生为主要对象，以机器人为主要平台，集中讲解机器人及相关领域的核心基础知识，着重培养学生的独立思考能力、编程能力和其他动手能力。将采用分组实践的模式提高学习兴趣，并展开个性化学习和探索性实验。理论部分的教学（20学时）采用集中授课方式。课程实验（40学时）采用分散与集中相结合的灵活方式。课程2学分。"
course.introductionEn: "Robotics is an interdisciplinary field which has a positive effect on cultivating innovative talents. Based on the platform of robots, the course is intended for sophomores to explain the key foundational knowledge on robotics and related areas. The course focuses on cultivating students’ independent thinking skills, programming abilities and practical abilities. In the course, the students would be formed into groups to increase interest in learning and expand personalized learning and exploratory experiments. The theoretical part of this course (20 class hours) will be taught in classrooms. The practical part of this course (40 class hours) will be conducted either separately by individual student or together for all students. This course has 2 credits. "

course.introduction: 现代社会是个高度复杂的互联世界，这种连接性随处可见，如互联网，微博关注关系，QQ群，企业间的关系，国家之间的关系等。网络中个体的自发行为微妙地影响他个体，如何刻画和理解这些现象，是现代科学研究的热点。不同学科领域从不同的角度，采用不同的技术方法来刻画互联的网络结构及其行为特征。本课程从图论、博弈和市场经济三个不同的角度给学生介绍这一新领域的发展，培养学生从“计算思维”的角度去理解博弈与市场经济的技术方法在网络中的应用。

course.introduction: "本课程强调趣味性，实用性和科学性相结合，将化学实验应用到日常饮食，家居，医疗，美容，化工等方方面面，使学生在享受化学乐趣的同时，进一步感悟化学原理，并应用所学化学知识对生活和社会中的化学问题作出正确的判断和解释；同时以科研实验室中的标准操作方法训练学生，使其提早了解和掌握基本测试仪器的使用，以补充基础实验课程中欠缺之处，为其今后的科研训练打下基础。采取2～3人/组的形式，学生自由选取教师给出的备选研究课题，经过文献查阅，调研并与教师讨论后，自主设计实验方案，进行实验操作，总结实验结果，交流实验心得，完"

course.introduction: 本课程主要讲述有关半导体光电子器件的基本物理及其相关理论公式及应用, 通过一系列简单的理论推导和举例说明, 学员将逐步学习掌握电子, 空穴, 光子之间的相互作用, 费米黄金法则, 以及基本光电子器件的特性等等. 主要内容包括: 半导体电子学基础, 量子力学基础, 半导体能带结构, 麦克斯韦方程组和光学波导, 半导体中的光学过程, 半导体激光器, 速率方程, 半导体探测器, 半导体级联激光器.
course.introductionEn: "Learning objectives:?The basic operation principle of optoelectronic devices, e.g., semiconductor laser, photodetector, quantum cascade laser, optical waveguides?Interaction among electron, hole, photon. Energy bands of semiconductor, electron-hole radiative recombination, optical mode confinement, stimulated emission?Interband and intersubband optical transitions, Fermi’s golden rule, rate equations, modulation response?Key performance characteristics of optoelectronic devices, efficiency, noise"
course.designateTextbook: 无
course.referenceTextbook: "1.Shun Lien Chuang, Physics of Optoelectronic devices, John Wiley & Sons, Inc., 1995. (QC673 C48).2.Paul Harrison, Quantum Wells, Wires and Dots, 3rd Edition, Wiley, 2009.3.G. P. Agrawal, N. K. Dutta, Semiconductor Lasers, 2nd ed., Van Nostrand Reinhold, 1993.4.H. C. Liu and F. Capasso, Intersubband Transition in Quantum Wells: Physics and Device Applications I, Academic Press, Semiconductors and Semimetals Vol. 62, 2000."

course.introduction: 本课程的内容主要包括光的基本特性，有机半导体材料中光致产生的极化子，双极化和孤子的特性和分辨；有机聚合物半导体的制备和掺杂；光激子的产生，传输和分离，电荷的产生和收集。有机太阳能电池的结构包括双层（bilayer）和本体异质结聚合物（bulk heterojunction）及他们对器件效率的影响。
course.introductionEn: This course will cover sunlight properties (air mass, photon energy, solar photon flux, and solar spectral irradiance), basic concepts (e.g. solitons, polarons, bipolarons), doping and processing, electronic structures, photo-induced excitons and charge carriers, and energy migration and transport in organic semiconductors. In addition, basic types of organic PV devices including bilayer, randomly mixed bulk-heterojunction, and orderly prepared heterojunction devices will also be discussed.
course.designateTextbook: 1.Semiconducting and Metallic Polymers (Oxford Graduate Texts) by Alan J. Heeger, Niyazi Serdar Sariciftci, Ebinazar B. Namdas, ISBN-13: 978-0198528647, Publisher: Oxford University Press, USA (September 25, 2010)
course.referenceTextbook: 2.Handouts from the instructor （乔博士备课笔记）

course.introductionEn: College English Writing is designed mainly for freshmen and sophomores who wish to improve their English writing skills. course.introduction: 该课程选取中国文化中一些最具特色的内容和亮点，如饮食，中医，节日，旅游，建筑，音乐，戏剧，书法，国画，生肖，功夫，哲学等方面，通过阅读典型的事例和材料使学生比较具体和深入的了解中国文化精神，在交流中能够用英语将中国文化介绍给外国人。
course.introductionEn: The course focuses on the topics featuring Chinese culture such as Food, Medicine, Festivals, Travelling, Architecture, Music, Opera, Calligraphy, Painting, Zodiac, Kongfu, and Philosophy,  etc. Students learn about the above in depth through reading relevant materials so as to be able to introduce Chinese culture to foreigners in English.
course.designateTextbook: "Insights into China: An English Reading Course of Chinese Culture ( 《感悟中国---中国文化英语阅读教程》) 黄建滨主编 上海外语教育出版社"

mngtDepartment.jmRemark: 预科生：谢老师 63602251老图书馆2２７室； 军训与军事理论：刑老师 63606080 东区老图书馆410室 junxing@ustc.edu.cn

course.introduction: 现代科学表明宇宙中99％以上的可观测物质是等离子体。《等离子天体物理学概念》这门课程的主要目的就是向学生介绍作为宇宙基本物质成分的等离子体及其对宇宙天体结构和动力学演化的影响。内容包括等离子天体物理学的发展简史；等离子体物理和天体等离子体现象的一些基本概念；以及等离子天体物理学在天文学中的位置及其学科发展的现状和前景。
course.introductionEn: The topics covered in this course are basic concepts of plasma astrophysics, including the history of developments of plasma astrophysics, basic properties of cosmic plasmas, basic plasma processes and active phenomena in astrophysics, and the new plasma cosmology based on plasma physics.
course.designateTextbook: 无
course.referenceTextbook: "Physics of the Plasma Universe，Anthony L. Peratt，Springer-Verlag, New York, 1991Cosmic Plasma, Hannes Alfven, D. Reidel, Dordrecht, 1981"

course.introduction: 本课程以重要遗址的发掘和研究为例，讲授科技考古学的发展简史，科技考古学的理论、方法以及科技考古学与考古学的关系；重点介绍相关学科基础知识、实验技能在冶金考古、陶瓷考古、地质考古、环境考古、生物考古、农业考古、音乐考古、考古年代学、文物保护等科技考古学领域的应用、研究成果及发展趋势。
course.introductionEn: Based on the excavation and research of important archaeological sites, the course provides a brief introduction to the history, fundamental theory and methodology of archaeometry and its role in archaeology. The emphasis will be put on the application of relevant knowledge and experimental skills in metallurgical archaeology, ceramic archaeology, environmental archaeology, geo-archaeology, bio-archaeology, agricultural archaeology, archaeological chronology, and the cultural relic protection etc.. In addition, new achievements and developmental trends in these fields will be discussed as well.
course.designateTextbook: 《科技考古学概论》（自编）

course.introduction: 本课程是以通俗易懂的方式把理论物理相关领域的发展以及一些前沿问题较为系统地进行介绍，其目的是让高年级本科生在决定今后自己的研究前能对相关领域有一定深度的了解。本课程有一个20学时的简化版和一个40学时的加强版，具体讲授内容由理论物理学科讲授老师的研究领域决定。比如“从粒子物理到弦理论”将介绍粒子物理、基本相互作用、量子场论、孤子特性、弦与膜以及M－理论的相关方面和一些近期进展。
course.introductionEn: This is an introduction course in theoretical physics, whose aim is to prepare students in their earlier stage to have some good knowledge of certain subject in this field so that they can make wise decision to continue their study toward advanced degree. This course has two versions: 20-hour simplified one and 40-hour enhanced one and the actual lecture context is determined by who is teaching this course from the theory group in USTC. For example, “From particle physics to string theory” includes introductions to particle physics, elementary interactions, quantum field theory, solitons, strings and branes as well as M-theory and its recent development among other things.
course.designateTextbook: 教师自编讲义
course.referenceTextbook: 《A First Course in String Theory》，Zwiebach / Cambridge

course.introduction: 以自主设计性为主的物理实验课题探究，自主设计实验方案，搭建实验装置，应用综合实验方法和技能, 及现代物理实验技术和方法系统地进行力学、电磁学、光学物理量的测量。每学期提前设置实验小课题，由学生自由选择课题，在学期时间内完成实验探究并参加答辩获取成绩，培养学生综合创新实践能力。
course.introductionEn: This course focuses on exploring physics experimental topics with independent design, designing experimental plans, constructing experimental equipment, applying comprehensive experimental methods and skills, and systematically measuring mechanical, electromagnetic, and optical physical quantities using modern physics experimental techniques and methods. Each semester, small experimental topics are set up in advance, and students are free to choose topics. During the semester, they complete experimental exploration and participate in defense to obtain grades, and cultivate their comprehensive innovation and practical abilities.

course.introduction: "人们通常用眼睛仰望星空--就是用可见光观测宇宙世界。如果用无线电波探测宇宙星空，我们会看到什么呢？《射电天文导论》是用通俗的语言讲述宇宙中的天体和它们辐射出来的各种波长的电磁波，特别强调天体辐射的无线电波(即射电)能够带给我们新的物理内容。很多结果是其他天文观测手段无法揭示的、宇宙天体的新特征。射电天文是天文和无线电工程结合。我们讲述射电望远镜如何探测的天体的射电辐射，如何进行观测，观测数据如何处理导出天体的性质。"

course.introduction: 科学计量学是一门较为崭新的学科，它运用科学数据、数学方法、理论模型对科学的各个方面和整体进行定量化研究和评估，从微观、中观、宏观等层面揭示科学自身和各种支撑要素的发展规律。该课程的主要内容将由科学计量学基本概念、三大经典规律、常见分析指标、影响因子与期刊评价、H类指数、文献耦合与同被引分析、马修效应与马修迹象、各类全新评价方法、与同行评议关系、在实践中的应用等十个部分组成。课程还将结合具体案例讲授若干发表在资讯科学（Information Science）领域权威杂志上的最新研究成果。通过该课程的学习，可以使得学生全面了解科学计量学的基本知识，深入领会引文分析的真谛，逐步掌握学术评估（即判断期刊、论著、学者、机构等的学术水平）的基本手段。
course.introductionEn: Scientometrics is a newly emerging subject. The course consists of several parts as follows: the basic concepts of sientomrtics, three classical principles, index of routine analysis, impact factor and journal evaluation, H-index, bibliographic coupling and co-citation analysis, Matthew Effect and Matthew Phenomenon, truly original approaches, the relationship between the peer review and the quantitative evaluation, application and practice, etc. The course also introduces the latest research achievements in information science. Having followed this course, students should understand the basic knowledge of scientometrics, grasp the true meaning of citation analysis, and master the methods of the measurement of research performance.
course.designateTextbook: 自编讲义《科学计量学》，吴强。
course.referenceTextbook: "1.[荷]亨克.F.莫德著，佟贺丰等译，《科研评价中的引文分析》。北京：科学技术文献出版社，2010年第1版。2. Michael S. Rosenberg. A Biologist’s Guide to Impact Factors. School of Life Sciences, Arizona State University, Tempe, AZ 85287‐4501.3. Nicola De Bellis. Bibliometrics and Citation Analysis: From the Science Citation Index to Cybermetrics. The Scarecrow Press Inc., 2009.4.袁军鹏，《科学计量学高级教程》。科学技术文献出版社，2010年第1版。5.梁立明、武夷山等著，《科学计量学：理论探讨与案例研究》。北京：科学出版社，2006年第1版。"

course.introduction: 物理化学III是一门横跨物理化学多个分支的综合课程，结合介绍现代计算机化学及其在生物化学、材料科学、环境化学等研究课题方面的应用。课程突出强调物理化学的基本概念及其内在的紧密相互关系，注重解决实际问题的思路与能力。课程重点介绍量子力学基础、变分法、微扰理论、分子轨道理论、密度泛函理论、基函数、电子相关等一系列量子化学概念与方法，同时介绍分子光谱、统计力学、热力学、反应动力学等分支学科中的基本内容与重要概念，最后介绍计算机化学在蛋白质和DNA结构、大气污染及环境化学研究中的一些应用实例。课程全程用英语授课，学生作业与考试全部使用英语。
course.introductionEn: Physical Chemistry III is an integrated course that covers all major topics of modern physical chemistry along with modern computational chemistry and applications in current research areas, including biochemistry, material science, and environmental chemistry. The course focuses on fundamental concepts and internal relationships among various topics of physical chemistry as well as on practical skills and techniques in solving research problems. The course selectively gives in-depth lectures as well as highlights on quantum mechanics, variational methods, perturbation theory, molecular orbital theory, density functional theory, basis set, electron correlation, computational methods and techniques, molecular spectroscopy, statistical mechanics, thermodynamics, intermolecular forces, applications of computational chemistry in protein and DNA structures and in air pollution and other environmental problems. All lectures are delivered in English. Homework assignments and exams are given in English and are expected to be completed in English.
course.designateTextbook: “Quantum Chemistry”5th Ed. by I.N. Levine， Prentice Hall, New Jersey
course.referenceTextbook: "“Essentials of Computational Chemistry” 2nd Ed. by C. Cramer, Wiley“Physical Chemistry”6th Edition, by I.N. Levine, McGraw-Hill"

course.introduction: 信息科技日新月异，计算机仿真不但是研究物理的工具，也成为找寻与设计新材料的一大利器。本课程要以每周一个独立单元的明快进度，向学生们介绍如何利用最先进的材料计算计算机仿真软件与3D交互式图形接口来预测材料的性质。内容涵盖传统固态物理学之材料的晶体结构、能带结构、机械性质、电学性质、光学性质、磁学性质等重要主题，同时兼顾科技应用及广度，可协助学生培养研究的基础及提升就业的竞争力。
course.introductionEn: This course introduces the density functional theory and its applications. It is organized by three parts as follows: 1) Fundamental theory: establishing the Kohn-Sham equation,introducing the basic concepts, such as the supercell, fractional occupied state, the projected density of states, band structure, Brillouin zone and k sampling, etc 2) Modeling: Constructing computational models of supercell, doped crystals, crystals with defects to study the impact of impurities and defects on materials performance; Building surface structure through the vacuum layer structure to study surface adsorption and reconstruction.3) Applications: Using CASTEP program to calculate physical quantities such as atomic orbital, molecular structure, chemical bond orders, bond energy, surface reconstruction, work function, cell parameter and density of states. The impact of pseudo-potential choice,regulations of important parameters, accuracy and convergence test on the calculation results are also introduced.
course.referenceTextbook:

《计算材料学基础 》北京航空航天大学出版社 张跃

course.introduction: 光机电系统的应用日趋广泛。本课程讲授光机电系统涉及到的光学、机械、电路与控制方面的基本理论，特别强调不同学科间的交叉知识和应用。通过本课程的学习，期望学生能掌握光机电系统的基本理论、奠定光机电系统的应用基础。 课程具体内容包括参加长春光机所暑期夏令营或暑期学校，听取光机电前沿学术讲座或报告。
course.introductionEn: Optical, mechanical and electrical systems are applied more and more widely. This course introduces the basic theories of optical, mechanical and electrical systems, and especially addresses some cross knowledge of the concerned areas. After learning the course, students are expected to grasp the basic theories of optical, mechanical and electrical systems, and build a good application foundation on these systems. The content includes participating in the summer camp or summer school of Changchun Optical Machinery Institute and listening to the academic lectures or reports on the frontier of optical machinery and electronics.
course.referenceTextbook:

《光机电一体化系统设计》，范宁军，机械工业出版社，2010.3

course.introductionEn: LabVIEW(Laboratory Virtual instrument Engineering) is a graphical programming language developed by NI Company, it is widely accepted by the industry, academia and research laboratory as a standard data acquisition and instrument control software. course.introduction: "根据《九所首批“985工程”建设高等学校人才培养合作与交流协议书》及《2013年5月C9高校联盟杭州会议纪要》的相关内容及精神，南京大学将举办2013年“C9高校联盟暑期学校”，暑期学校面向C9联盟九校的学生开放。基本内容如下，请尽快将附件详细内容通知到2010级、2011级学生。 南大暑期学校基本情况：一、主题和教学目标在高校开展国防教育活动，是按照国防教育要面向现代化、面向世界、面向未来的要求，是适应我国人才培养的战略目标和加强国防后备力量建设的需要，是提高学生全面素质的一个重要环节，所以搞好高校国防教育具有深远的意义。为激发大学生关注国防的热情，增加大学生对国际形势的了解，本届暑期学校的主题是“当前国际形势与中国周边安全环境”。 通过开设一系讲座、参观和讨论，让学生了解我国面临的机遇和挑战，启发学生要居安思危，保持清醒头脑，增强忧患意识，理性看待当前的国际局势。 二、开班时间开班时间：2013年7月14日- 7月22日              7月14日全天报到              7月15日-21日授课              7月22日离校三、教学内容及授课方式教学以讲座为主，辅以参观和讨论，详见http://www.teach.ustc.edu.cn/page.asp?post=1213"

course.introduction: 本课程旨在通过一些著名的、趣味性的思想实验、道德难题或哲学典故，深入浅出地分析和介绍西方伦理学的基本理论，包括道德相对主义、伦理学利己主义、行为功利主义、规则功利主义，康德的义务论、罗斯的初始义务论、自利契约论、非自利契约论、美德伦理学和道德情感主义等，拓展学生的国际视野，引导学生从整个人类的视角观察日常道德生活中的伦理学问题，提高学生批判性地理解和分析各种伦理学基本理论以及现实道德问题的能力。（本课程备有相关课程网站，可供学生下载相关教材、课件、复习题等。）
course.introductionEn: This course will provide an introduction to Western Ethics.  We will focus on some classical and modern views concerning the question of what determines the rightness and wrongness of actions.  The course will cover some of the main ethical theories in the West, such as moral relativism, ethical egoism, act utilitarianism and rule utilitarianism, Kantianism, Ross’s theory of prima facie duty, contractarianism and contractualism, and virtue ethics.  We will discuss those theories through some famous thought experiments, moral cases and dilemmas.  The course will acquaint students with major currents in ethics and improve their capability of understanding, critically analyzing and evaluating contemporary moral issues from the global perspective as a human being.  (The students can visit our course website to download some texts, reading materials, lecture notes, PPTs, paper assignments, etc.)
course.designateTextbook: "1.陈真：《当代西方规范伦理学》，南京师范大学出版社，2006年2.James Rachels, The Elements of Moral Philosophy, 4th edition, New York, NY: McGraw-Hill College, 2003"

course.introduction: 在《论语》中，孔子及其弟子讨论教育的话语占了很大的比重，这些讨论散见于《论语》各篇各章，内容驳杂，思想丰富。孔子的教育观与他的历史观、人生观、政治观等内容互相关联，是孔子思想体系的重要组成。孔子的教育思想深刻地影响了几千年来中国社会的教育体制、教育方式和教育追求，并对当前的教育事业有着重要的借鉴价值和启发意义。本课程通过对孔子教育思想的系统梳理，较为全面地反映孔子教育思想的原貌，总结传统儒家杰出的教育智慧，为青年大学生的健康成长提供有益的养料。

course.introduction: 本课程用算符演化来解释脉冲Fourier 变换核磁共振原理，系统介绍了化学位移，偶合常数，NOE等核磁共振参数。在实验方法上，适当介绍氢谱以及TOCSY、NOESY、HSQC、HMBC等常用的二维核磁共振谱及其在小分子结构解析上的应用。在具体实践上，提供核磁谱仪的基本上机操作培训，包括二维核磁共振谱图的采集、处理和分析。

course.introduction: "本课程是一门面向学科前沿的专业基础课程，主要分为两部分：统计力学系综部分和量子统计动力学部分。系综部分包括系综的概念、主要系综和热力学、近独立子系统、晶体热容、量子气体、非理想气体、相变系统(铁磁系统)、分子力学和Monte Carlo介绍等。量子统计动力学部分包括密度矩阵与刘维尔方程、希尔伯特空间和刘维尔空间量子动力学、相关函数与响应函数、涨落耗散定理、多维非线性光谱基础等。预修要求：统计热力学基础，量子力学基础面向对象：高年级本科生及研究生"

course.introduction: 《生活中的化学科普实验》是面向全校非化学专业的低年级本科生所开设的选修课程，共8次课，计40学时，1学分。课程内容是以化学在社会生活中的应用为主线，以人类生活、环境、安全、健康等密切相关的化学现象为切入点，注重实验内容的趣味性和科普性，按照“趣味化学实验”、“生活化学实验”、“综合化学实验”三大模块进行授课，使学生感受化学的精彩和魅力。
course.introductionEn: 《The Popular Science Experiments of Chemistry in Life》is a general selective course during summer vacation, opening for the undergraduate students who are not major in chemistry. The course is consisted by 8 different experiments with 40 credit hours and 1 credit. And is concerning about the application of chemistry experiment in human life, environment, safety, health, et al. The content of the course is divided into three parts, that is "Interesting Chemistry Experiment", "Life Chemistry Experiment" and "Comprehensive Chemistry Experiment". Through the study of the course, students will experience the wonderfulness and charm of chemistry.
course.designateTextbook: 根据课程设计和教学内容，无合适的现成教材
course.referenceTextbook:
(1) Chemistry in Context：Applying Chemistry in Society，[美] Catherine H. Middlecamp著，化学工业出版社，2018年。
(2)《Chemical Demonstrations: A Handbook for Teachers of Chemistry》，[美] Bassam Z．Shakhashiri著，王冠博、马玉国 译，北京大学出版社，2013年。
(3)《化学实验与生活》，李梅、韩莉 著，化学工业出版社，2009年。

course.introduction: 经典阅读旨在引领学生深度阅读名著，带领学生深刻领会名著的时代背景、历史价值和思想观点，培养学生阅读习惯及思考能力，丰富学生的精神家园。其中《红楼梦》、《庄子》、《形式逻辑》、《精神分析引论》、《认知心理学经典实验》等经典分别来自文史哲和心理学四大领域，课程将采用读、听、聊、学等互动体验式教学方式，使学生有不一样的阅读感受。
course.introductionEn: A course to teach students how to read classics in depth, historical background, historical value and point of view and how to cultivate a good reading habit and thinking capacity, thus enriching their  spiritual home. Classics in this course include A Dream in Read Mansions, Chuang Tse, Formal Logic, Introduction to Psychoanalysis, The Classical Experiment of Cognitive Psychology, which are chosen from four great fields such as literature, history, philosophy and psychology. An approach of Interactive Experience is used, including reading, listening, chatting and imitating.

mngtDepartment.jmRemark: 预科生：谢老师 63602251老图书馆2２７室； 军训与军事理论：刑老师 63606080 东区老图书馆410室 junxing@ustc.edu.cn

courseCategory.nameEn: 原一般通识，2024秋启用
courseCategory.name: 素能拓展课程

course.introduction:
机械图样是人们进行技术思想交流的工具，是工程技术人员的共同语言。作为高层次的工程技术人才，必须具备画图和读图的能力，而本课程就是培养这种能力的技术基础课程，通过本课程的学习，学生将具备空间逻辑思维能力和创造性构型设计能力，掌握绘图、读图的基本技能。本课程还将在教学中引入计算机辅助绘图和三维建模技术，以期学生能够熟练掌握这一门作为现代设计不可或缺的基本技术，以适应现代设计的需要。还要使学生通过本课程的学习培养良好的工程意识和认真细致的工作作风。本课程内容：

①介绍绘制机械图样必须遵循的国家标准；

②介绍机械图样生成的原理（投影原理）、内容和表达方法；

③介绍三维实体模型和二维视图的作用；

④介绍计算机辅助绘图软件AutoCAD的使用，使学生掌握计算机绘图和标注的技能。
course.introductionEn:
Design is a kind of creative activities to solve the problem by human’s wisdom and skills. An engineering drawing is used to fully and clearly define requirements for engineered items. Engineering drawings is also a language—a graphical language that communicates ideas and information from one mind to another. The popularization and development of computer technology have brought great revolutionary change for the engineering design. Computer-aided drawing (CAD) is the most basic link and has played a decisive role. Its application is more and more widely. As soon as possible to apply CAD into professional and life of students, will add gorgeous colors to their work and daily life. The course contents include: (1) Introducing the role of 3D entity modeling and the 2D drafting; (2) Explaining the mechanism of mechanical drawings generation (projection principle and expression method, and the rules of the national standard. (3) Demonstrating the usage of AutoCAD and enable students to master the skills to plot the engineering drawing. (4) Introducing Chinese national standards about the mechanical design.

Teaching mode: paperless teaching.
course.designateTextbook: "1.自行开发的基于web的多媒体全课程教程。2.AutoCAD软件。 "
course.referenceTextbook: 机械制图（第七版）同济大学等院校编，何铭新等主编，高等教育出版社。
